note.p: Clergyman. Nephew of John Cavendish Browne, third Baron Kilmaine. BA, Trinity College, Dublin, 1851; ordained priest, 1854, Meath. Curate of Dungarvan, County Waterford, 1853–75; vicar, 1875–81. Vicar choral, Lismore Cathedral, 1858–81. Rector of Bredon with Norton and Cutsdean (near Tewkesbury, Gloucestershire), 1881–1911.
